ctu_text: ", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The scheme \"Government Working Women\u2019s Hostel\" is an initiative by the Social Welfare and Women Empowerment Department, Govt. of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to safe accommodation and food facilities to working women who live far away from their families and belong to lower and middle-income groups. The women can stay 3 years in the hostel.
